an9.30:1.3: ‘Anatthaṁ me acari, taṁ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṁ paṭivineti;
an9.30:1.4: ‘anatthaṁ me carati, taṁ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṁ paṭivineti;
an9.30:1.5: ‘anatthaṁ me carissati, taṁ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṁ paṭivineti;
an9.30:1.8: ‘anatthaṁ carissati, taṁ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṁ paṭivineti;
an9.30:1.11: ‘atthaṁ carissati, taṁ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṁ paṭivineti.
